verses.verse: Help, <WH3467> Yahweh; <WH3068> for the godly man <WH2623> ceases. <WH1584> For the faithful <WH539> fail <WH6461> from among the children <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
Everyone <WH376> lies <WH7723> to <WH1696> his neighbor. <WH7453> They speak <WH1696> with flattering <WH2513> lips, <WH8193> and with a double <WH3820> heart. <WH3820>
May Yahweh <WH3068> cut off <WH3772> all flattering <WH2513> lips, <WH8193> and the tongue <WH3956> that <WH1696> boasts, <WH1419>
who have said, <WH559> "With our tongue <WH3956> we will prevail. <WH1396> Our lips <WH8193> are our own. <WH113> Who is lord over us?"

"Because of the oppression <WH7701> of the weak <WH6041> and because of the groaning <WH603> of the needy, <WH34> I will now arise, <WH6965>" says <WH559> Yahweh; <WH3068> "I will set <WH7896> him in safety <WH3468> from those who malign him. <WH6315>"
The words <WH565> of Yahweh <WH3068> are flawless <WH2889> words, <WH565> as silver <WH3701> refined <WH6884> in a clay <WH776> furnace, <WH5948> purified <WH2212> seven times. <WH7659>
You will keep <WH8104> them, <WH3068> Yahweh. You will preserve <WH5341> them from this <WH2098> generation <WH1755> forever. <WH5769>
The wicked <WH7563> walk <WH1980> on every side, <WH5439> when what is vile <WH2149> is exalted <WH7311> among the sons of men. <WH1121>
